title: Gold 2 to Bronze 5. GG Rito
body: managed to go 4-6 in provisionals, straight down to bronze 5. I understand wanting people to climb to where they belong. But the skill differential is just saddening when the other team has people who are legitimately bronze. I mean, it's like 40-50 lp a win, but those people who get the game ruined for them because of provisional BS is kind of saddening. No one likes a stomp
